subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a win, the mood in the Yankees’ clubhouse was subdued as players learned that Carlos Beltran, who left the team the day before, said on his Facebook page that his wife had miscarried.
snippet: After a win, the mood in the Yankees’ clubhouse was subdued as players learned that Carlos Beltran, who left the team the day before, said on his Facebook page that his wife had miscarried.
